info.+content: Gakuen Mokushiroku - Highschool of the Dead
High School of the Dead - Apocalipsis en el instituto
Highschool of the Dead - A Escola dos Mortos
学園黙示録 HIGHSCHOOL OF THE DEAD

Takashi Komuro is a normal high school boy, until an infection breaks out that turns people into zombie-like creatures. Along with his friends & the school nurse, they fight their way out and continue their journey to find out what exactly has happened to the world.
"HIGHSCHOOL OF THE DEAD" by Kisida Kyodan & The Akebosi Rockets

#08: "The place of hope" by Maon Kurosaki
#09: "Hōseki no Supai" (宝石のスパイ) by Maon Kurosaki
